system.description: You turn centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into their giant counterparts. Only one type of vermin can be transmuted. The number of vermin affected is based on their size: Diminutive or Fine 1 per level, Tiny 1 per 2 levels, Small 1 per 3 levels, Medium 1 per 4 levels. The vermin remain in giant form for 1 min./level. They obey your simple mental commands.
system.target: Up to three centipedes, scorpions, or spiders, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
